channel.title: Maintainability on Seven steps
channel.description: Recent content in Maintainability on Seven steps

item.title: Maintainability Is Relative
item.description: I just found a great example of the variability of the need of creating maintainable code. Somewhere around 2006, I created a script that posts to the Livejournal community daily_tao a new chapter of the Tao Te Ching every day. Today in 2016, I had a need to look for the script, the second time in maybe the last eight years that I had to look at it. I temporarily wasn't sure of where that script was.
